name: Follow the Frozen Footsteps
description:
Follow the Frozen Footsteps is an Adventure/Exploration game placing the player in a mysterious and magical world in the snowy mountains. Venture through beautiful environments, discover the mystery of what happened to the former inhabitants, and why you've been brought to this place.

Controls:
WASD: Character Movement
Mouse: Controls Camera
M/ (Comma Key): Open and close the maps within the Castle
